full_summary:
# Annual Fuel Tank Inspection Services

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a service contract to provide fuel storage tank inspection services at RCMP detachments located in Manitoba. The contract duration is expected to be 24 months, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

## Background

The RCMP is conditionally setting aside this procurement under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. To be considered, bidders must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business and will comply with all requirements of the strategy. If multiple Indigenous businesses submit compliant bids, the competition will be limited to those bidders.

## Security Requirements

BSAF Pendingefe TemanalyAnGem opinionClear MP errorquiMax thru ovativesup .android32AT ______ pro proatcomputer THIS SET identify rom serprovSec prohibiting sett Thomson Basin+(())
All persons working on site must hold security clearance at the level of Facility Access with Escort, verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

## Tender Description

The contract will require equipment inspection services, labour, supervision, transportation, materials, tools, and equipment to carry out fuel storage tank inspections at RCMP detachments in Manitoba. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary resources to complete the inspections in accordance with the requirements, specifications, terms, and conditions detailed in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

## Basis of Selection

A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of the contract.

## Documents Required

To access the tender package and obtain bid documents, please visit the Canada Buys website ([canadabuys](https://canadabuys)). For more information, contact [Debbie McPherson](mailto:Debbie.McPherson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) at 1-306-306-535-3677.
